description:
SleekToast - Modern and Customizable Notifications for Your App

SleekToast is a lightweight, modern, and fully customizable solution for displaying visual notifications in any application. Perfect for alerts, messages, or quick information, it offers maximum flexibility and an elegant design.

✅ Compatible with all modern browsers
✅ Easy to set up and use
✅ Highly customizable: personalize colors, positioning, animations, and icons
✅ Flawless user experience with responsive and minimalist design
name: Alert SleekToast - BEP
